titleInfo.title: DETAINED in the Parish jail of Avoyelles

mods.abstract: DETAINED in the Parish jail of Avoyelles, the following runaway slaves, to wit: JACK, negro man, said to belong to Chs. Allen of Shreveport, La. Aged 26 years. Height, 6 feet. Nov. 7th 1863. CHARLES, negro man, said to belong to John G. Miller of Fort Adams, Miss. Aged 23 years. Height 5 feet, 9 inches. Nov. 7th 1863. JIM, negro man, said to belong to Wm. L. Lornes. Aged 56 years. Height 5 feet 7 inches. Nov. 7th 1863. The owners are hereby duly notified to claim their property according to law. DORA GUILLOT, Jailor.
mods.note: Chs. Allen; John G. Miller; Wm. L. Lornes
